summary: VBT Camera Feature Testing - Phase 1 Implementation verified. Backend APIs working correctly (8/8 tests pass). Frontend navigation and VBT Camera page load successfully. Camera permission prompt displays as expected in web environment.

ui_bugs.issue: When camera permission is not granted, the permission prompt screen lacks a back button/header, leaving users with no way to navigate back except browser back

issues: Missing back navigation when permission is not granted

action_items: Add header with back button to the camera permission prompt screen in vbt-camera.tsx (lines 136-148)
critical_code_review_comments: GET /api/vbt/providers correctly returns 'camera' in providers list with proper metadata
VBT via Camera button on add-strength.tsx correctly uses data-testid='vbt-camera-btn'
Camera permission logic in vbt-camera.tsx works correctly - shows permission prompt on web
vbt-camera.tsx has proper data-testid attributes on key elements (vbt-camera-back-btn, start-recording-btn, etc.)

success_rate.frontend: 95% (navigation works, camera page loads, permission prompt displayed - only missing back button on permission screen)

seed_data_creation: Created VBT data with provider='camera' via API for testing - visible in VBT charts
context_for_next_testing_agent: VBT Camera Phase 1 is working. Backend accepts 'camera' provider in VBT data. Frontend navigation: Athletes > Atleta Um > Assessments > Strength & VBT > VBT via Camera works. Camera permission prompt shows correctly on web. The camera functionality itself (recording, velocity tracking) requires native iOS/Android and cannot be tested in web environment.
features_verified: Login do coach funciona (coach_test@test.com / password) - VERIFIED
Lista de atletas aparece corretamente após login - VERIFIED
Navegação: Athletes > Atleta Um > Assessments > Strength & VBT - VERIFIED
Botão 'VBT via Camera' está visível na seção de entrada de dados VBT - VERIFIED
Método manual de entrada VBT ainda funciona independentemente - VERIFIED
Clicar em 'VBT via Camera' navega para a tela de câmera corretamente - VERIFIED
API endpoint GET /api/vbt/providers retorna o provider 'camera' - VERIFIED
API endpoint POST /api/vbt/data aceita provider 'camera' - VERIFIED
